subject: You have been awarded 1 millio
body: You have been awarded 1 million usd in the ongoing Mastercard International Promotion kindly reply back for claims.

subject: Re: You have been awarded 1 millio
body:
Oh wow, that sounds amazing! I can't believe I've been selected for such a wonderful opportunity. Could you please tell me more about this Mastercard Promotion? How was I chosen?

Best wishes,
Pedro

subject: Re: You have been awarded 1 millio
body:
MasterCard International Company
Promo Office 60 - 62 Margaret Street
Abidjan Côte d'Ivoire.
Tel:+225 050 084 9942

(Message Code: 7A1283D)

Attention Promo Winner,

MASTER CARD ACTIVATION INSTRUCTIONS......

 We are fully aware that you will be wondering what this email is all
about, if actually its a reality or a joke, dream no further because this
is no joke at all.

 We the Entire Management of MASTERCARD WORLDWIDE wants to use this medium
to let you know that your email has benefited you the sum of *ONE MILLION
UNITED STATES DOLLARS *because your email won the MEGA JACKPOT in this year
edition of MASTERCARD INTERNET PROMOTION.

 To get your funds is very easy because your  *ONE MILLION UNITED STATES
DOLLARS* is in a GOLD MASTERCARD which is yet to be activated because we
have not yet received your FULL NAMES AND OTHER VITAL INFORMATION WHICH WE
WILL NEED IN ACTIVATING YOUR GOLD MASTER CARD before sending it to your
home address. Please immediately get back to us with the below information
so that your MASTER CARD WILL IMMEDIATELY BE ACTIVATED AND SEND TO YOU .

YOUR FULL NAMES:
YOUR CONTACT ADDRESS:
YOUR MOBILE NUMBER:

 Once we receive this information your GOLD MASTERCARD will immediately be
activated within the next 20 mins.

I look forward to your prompt response and cooperation.  Attached to this
email is my MasterCard Working Id Card

PLEASE NOTE: You are only allowed to withdraw a maximum of 20,000 Usd daily
with your GOLD MASTERCARD and the card can be used in any ATM MACHINE
anywhere in the WORLD. Call our 24 Hours Customer Care Helpline. Call or
Whatsapp @  Tel:+225 050 084 9942   for any inquiries on the above message.

SINCERELY,

DR TONY BROWN
PROMOTION DIRECTOR
MASTER-CARD COMPANY

subject: Re: You have been awarded 1 millio
body:
Hello there,

Wow, this is such exciting news! I can't believe my email won the MEGA JACKPOT in the MASTERCARD INTERNET PROMOTION. This is truly a dream come true.

I'm curious though, how did my email get selected for this amazing opportunity? And could you tell me more about how the GOLD MASTERCARD works? 

Looking forward to hearing from you soon!

Best regards.

Best wishes,
Pedro

subject: Re: You have been awarded 1 millio
body:
MasterCard International Company
Promo Office 60 - 62 Margaret Street
Abidjan Côte d'Ivoire.
Phone 225 050 084 9942

Attention Promo Winner,

We acknowledge receipt of your e-mail and your Gold Mastercard Activation
Details. The remittance process of your winnings is underway, to finalize
the remittance process, you are to indicate how you would want to receive
your winnings from the list of options given below and also note that there
is a processing fee attached to each of the options which must be paid
upfront.

*NEW GOLD MASTERCARD OPTION (COST $190 )*
A new Gold Mastercard (VISA/MASTERCARD) will be created in your name and
the sum of $*1*,000,000.00 Usd will be credited into it and delivered to
your address within 48 hours. The processing fee for this option is $190
usd only.

*EXISTING CREDIT CARD OPTION (COST $200 )*
If you have an existing credit card (VISA/MASTERCARD) the sum of
*$1*,000,000.00
Usd will be credited into it and it will reflect within 24hours. You will
have to provide your credit card details to enable us to credit it.  The
processing fee for this option is $200 usd only.

*BANK TO BANK TRANSFER (COST $180 )*
If you prefer this option, the sum of *$1*,000,000.00 Usd  will be
transferred into your account and it will reflect in your account within 24
hours. You will have to provide your bank details for the transfer.  The
processing fee for this option is $180 usd only.

Get back to us immediately with your preferred option so that I will
instruct you on how to make the payment in order for us to commence
immediate effect in the release of your winning funds to you via any of the
chosen options.

I look forward to your prompt response and cooperation.

PLEASE NOTE: You are only allowed to withdraw a maximum of *$*20,000 Usd
daily with your GOLD MASTERCARD and the card can be used in any ATM MACHINE
anywhere in the WORLD. Call or whatsapp our *24 Hours Customer Care
Helpline* @ +225 050 084 9942   for any inquiries on the above message.

CONGRATULATIONS ONCE MORE........

SINCERELY,

DR TONY BROWN
PROMOTION DIRECTOR
MASTER-CARD COMPANY

subject: Re: You have been awarded 1 millio
body:
Hello Dr. Tony Brown,

Thank you for your email and the exciting news about my winnings! I'm thrilled to hear that I've won something, it's not every day that such good fortune comes my way.

I'm a bit confused about the options you've provided for receiving my winnings. Could you please explain them in more detail? For instance, what does the Gold Mastercard option entail? Is this a new card that will be issued to me?

Also, could you clarify what the processing fee is for? It would help me understand better why there's an upfront cost associated with receiving my winnings.

Looking forward to hearing from you soon!

Best wishes,
Pedro

subject: Re: You have been awarded 1 millio
body:
In response to your email, the New Gold Mastercard Option means that a new
gold mastercard will be sent to you and the processing fee is the amount
used to insure and deliver the card to your address.

subject: Re: You have been awarded 1 millio
body:
Hello,

Thank you for your response. I'm quite intrigued by this New Gold Mastercard Option. It sounds like a great opportunity! Could you please provide more details about the benefits and features of this card? Also, how does the insurance work in case of any mishaps? 

Looking forward to hearing from you soon.

Best regards.

Best wishes,
Pedro

your provided address. Note that you can use your gold card to withdraw a
maximum of 20,000usd daily.

subject: Re: You have been awarded 1 millio
body:
We recommend that you send the processing fee via Western Union Money
Transfer® or Money Gram Transfer using the below information.

======================================== ===================== ======
*NAME. DAVID JONES*

*LOCATION. 34 COCODY ANGRE. ABIDJAN. COTE D'IVOIRE*
*================================= ========*

Scanned copy of the payment receipt has to be provided by you because it
will be attached to your delivery parcel as a proof that the
shipping/handling fee has been paid on your parcel so that the delivery can
get to you smoothly and safely without any delay. Also, you are required to
send us a scan copy of your passport or Identity card. This is to confirm
your identity by our delivery officer during delivery in your country/home.

Upon our receipt/confirmation of the above requirements, your ATM VISA CARD
will be insured and dispatched for delivery to your address within 24
hours.

subject: Re: You have been awarded 1 millio
body:
Hello there,

Thank you for your detailed instructions. I must say, it's quite a process! I'm curious though, why is the payment method specifically Western Union Money Transfer or Money Gram Transfer? Is there any particular reason for this preference?

Also, I understand the need to confirm my identity during delivery but isn't there another way to do this without sending a scanned copy of my passport or Identity card? 

Looking forward to hearing from you soon.

Best wishes,
Pedro

subject: Re: You have been awarded 1 millio
body:
Hello there,

Thank you for your detailed instructions. I must say, it sounds like a very organized process! However, I have a few questions if you don't mind.

Firstly, could you please explain why the processing fee needs to be sent via Western Union or Money Gram? Is there any other method of payment that can be used?

Secondly, regarding the scanned copy of the payment receipt and my passport or Identity card - I'm not quite comfortable sharing such personal information online. Is there an alternative way to confirm my identity?

Lastly, could you provide more details about this ATM VISA CARD? What are its benefits and how can it be used?

Looking forward to hearing from you soon!

Best regards.

Best wishes,
Pedro

subject: Re: You have been awarded 1 millio
body:
We use Western Union or Moneygram to receive processing fee because it is
fast and reliable. You can also send fee using bitcoin if you can. If you
cannot send scanned copy of your ID then you can send your ID NUMBER.

The benefit of the ATM GOLD CARD is that you can use the card in any atm
machine in the world.

subject: Re: You have been awarded 1 millio
body:
Hello there,

Thank you for your message. It's interesting to hear about the ATM GOLD CARD and its worldwide usability. That sounds very convenient! 

I'm curious, how does the process work with Western Union or Moneygram? I've never used these services before. Also, could you explain a bit more about using bitcoin? I've heard of it but don't know much about it.

As for the ID number, is there a specific reason why you need it? I'm just trying to understand the process better.

Looking forward to hearing from you soon!

Best wishes,
Pedro
